articles.title: A Rare Visitor to Long Island Is Driving Birders Cuckoo
articles.description: A common cuckoo, a species native to Europe and Asia, made several recent appearances in Riverhead, N.Y. The birds have been spotted in a handful of places in the lower 48 states, experts said.

articles.title: Where Is God in Gaza?
articles.description: The war, which has killed tens of thousands, laid waste to the Gaza Strip and shredded Israel’s reputation abroad, could soon be over. We explore how people have grappled with faith over the past two years.

articles.title: Why Investors Seem Underwhelmed by the Trump-Xi Meeting
articles.description: The highly anticipated event covered a lot of ground on tariff and trade barriers, but questions remain about reaching a lasting accord.
